speaker: President.
english: President. –The next item is the report ( A6-0089/2007 ) by Adamos Adamou, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on halting the loss of biodiversity by 2010 ( 2006/2233(INI) ).

agenda_item: Halting the loss of biodiversity by 2010 (debate)
